name: Anything Goes (Frances Studios)
description:
Anything Goes is a 2.5D story-driven fighting game.

 It plays like regular 2.D Fighting games but with a twist: while blocking, the opponent can go around your block stance!

 The story revolves around a street fighter looking for a master, only to find her blind and living in a rented place.

 Special Thank You:
